item.description:
Greeley Park Arts Festival by The Nashua Area Artist's Association

100 Concord St. Nashua NH 03060

Saturday August 18th & Sunday August 19th, 10:00 am - 5:00 pm both days.

Rain or Shine. Host: Sandra J Peters   sardnas426@comcast.net.

I would like to invite you to the 59th Annual Greeley Park Arts Show by the Nashua Area Artist's Association.  This is very well known and popular outdoor Art show, with over 50 Artists displaying and their artworks, in various media's. there are brochures on the sales/ information desk. Food vendors are there for water, soda, hot dogs, ice cream.

Please checkout our website www.nashuaareaartistsassoc.org. We are still in the need for volunteers for the show, Friday after 5:00 pm for set-up and Sunday at 5:00 for taking down the tents and packing them up.

You can email me at sardnas426@comcast.net.  I am Sandra J Peters Co-Director.

Best Regards.  Sandy P.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Meetup Sign in the Raffel Booth, Asl For Sandra P, or Meetup.
item.name: Greeley Park Arts Festival Nashua
